about_the_game:
You just moved to HEDGEHOG HILLS, a small village full of ADORABLE CUTE ANIMAL CHARACTERS!  You get your own HOUSE, and can visit the many places in this PEACEFUL area!

There you meet STORM THE SWAN, a ZANY and WACKY character who is always SCARED of something.  STORM says there's a MONSTER in the WOODS, but surely, they're only imagining things!

Enjoy this CUTE and EDUCATIONAL 8-bit adventure on your own portable 'Data Kid Entertainment System' available in select toy stores in the California area!  

STORM THE SWAN is an 8-bit style Point 'n' Click / Visual Novel Retro-Horror heavily inspired by the era of the Gameboy and children's cartoons of the 80s and 90s.  You're  a player for the newest children's game for a portable gaming system, but something is happening with the game (as well as the world around you) that is getting increasingly strange and scary.  

Meet and befriend several cute animal characters in HEDGEHOG HILLS, live and CUSTOMIZE your HOUSE, UNCOVER deep secrets in the game and witness the collapse of your own world.  

Storm the Swan is another addition to the "Data Time Software series", or "Date Time Universe".

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • OS: macOS Catalina 10.15.3
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Quad-Core Intel Core i7 / Apple M series
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: Storm the Swan - And the Power of FRIENDSHIP and IMAGINATION

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Make Cute Animal Friends in this 8-bit Gameboy-inspired adventure! But there's something lurking in the woods, with DARK SECRETS you'll need to uncover!
